hadiths.text: Narrated Abu 'Uthman al-Nahdi:'Umar wrote to 'Utbah b. Farqad that the Prophet (ﷺ) forbade (wearing) silk except so-and-so, and so-and-so, to the extent of two, three, or four fingers

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي لُبْسِ الْحَرِيرِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Reported About Wearing Silk
